short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows zen quotes to keep you mindful throughout your day

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feeling stuck and want to find a more calm state of mind? Click the Zen Quote Generator and you'll find a brief, mindful text that will surely shift your focus. 

Enjoy a beautiful and varied collection of quotes by Lao Tzu, the Buddha, Leonardo Da Vinci, of ancient Chinese proverbs and Samurai masters, just to name a few. 

The quotes are updated with every new version so that you will find something new each time you use the extension. 

Your feedback is welcome.

Peace be with you.

(code can be found on GitHub)
